user.summary: Hello there, my name is Teshome Kurabachew, I'm a full-stack web developer, software engineer and devops engineer. My goal is to deliver high quality services to my clients. I have been working morethan 1300+ hours in a remote environment by mastering algorithms, data-structures and full-stack development. For detailed information please continue reading. Also, don't forget to reach out to me if you're interested in my profile.
user.title: Software Engineer
user.name: Teshome Kurabachew
user.subtitle: Full-Stack Web Developer

about: Hello, My name is Teshome Kurabachew, and I have a Master's degree in software engineering. I entered the Microsoft Scholarship Program after graduation and graduated as a DevOps engineer. And received certificates in artificial intelligence, Azure Cloud Fundamentals, and Azure Cloud Administrators. I joined Microverse, a remote software development program that teaches programming through pair programming, and got the necessary hard and soft skills to be a successful full-stack developer. Throughout my learning path I developed so many projects in Ruby, Ruby on Rails, React JS with Redux, JavaScript, SCSS and so many technologies.

experience.title: Mentor (Volunteer)
description: Mentored junior web developers, providing technical support through code reviews.
Proposed improvements to code organization to improve code quality and overall performance.
Provided advice and tips on how to maintain motivation to maintain longevity in the program.

experience.title: Software Engineer, Senior Project Administrator, Contractual.
experience.company: OnTime Tech ICT Solution, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
description: Developed a web application for a local company to manage their projects and employees.
Implemented a project management system that allows the company to manage their projects and employees.
Implemented a system that allows the company to manage their employees' attendance and leave requests.

education.school: HiLCoE School of Computer Science and Technology
education.description: I spent three and a half years learning basic programming, SDL including requirements analysis and testing, I also mastered various data structures and algorithms using Java and JavaFX and developed several real-world projects.

education.filed: Remote Full Stack Web Development Program, Full Time
description: Spent 1300+ hours mastering algorithms, data structures, and full-stack development while simultaneously developing projects with Ruby, Rails, JavaScript, React, and Redux.
Developed skills in remote pair-programming using GitHub, industry-standard git-flow, and daily standups to communicate and collaborate with international remote developers.

honors.title: Android Developer with Java and Android Studio
honors.school: Google Africa Developer Scholarship together with Andela and Pluralsight

honors.title: Devops Engineer
honors.accomplishment: Certicates in AI, Fundamentals of Azure Cloud, and Devops (Azure cloud administrator associate).

tools.backend: Ruby on Rails, MySQL, SQL Server, MongoDB
tools.methods: Git, GitHub, Azure DevOps, UML, Heroku, Netlify, Mobile/Responsive Development, RSpec, TDD, Chrome Dev Tools, Postman, Redux
tools.languages: Ruby, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, C#, Java, Python, C++
tools.others: Soft skills, UX/UI design with Adobe XD, Software Development process with Visual Paradigm, Agile Methodology, Scrum, Kanban, and Waterfall.

projects.name: Trekker
projects.description: A web application that allows users to search for hiking trails in the Uganda. Users can also create an account and book their favorite places. A backend API was built with Ruby on Rails and the frontend was built with React and Redux.

projects.name: Favourite Meals
projects.description: A web application that allows users to create an account and add their favorite dishes, comment on any food they like and also  like the food as a recommendation for other users. The app takes data from an external API source and stores the user's data in another API. The project is a final project created only  by the JavaScript language.

projects.name: Space Travelers' Hub
projects.description: A web application that allows users to book rockets and join missions. The project takes data from external API source and it can able to store the users data in another API.

projects.name: Art Blog App
projects.description: An Art blog website that encourages artists to post their designs and also helps them to participate in different events especially related to the art gallery, and also gives them a chance to present their works at the event show. The project is built by HTML5/CSS and JavaScript.
